about_the_game:
Congratulations on your new position at Coopers Supermarket. Today marks the first day of your exciting career as a cashier. We hope you're as excited as we are to have another employee. Let the cute art, fun sound effects, and exciting race for points distract you from the soul-crushing reality that is working in retail.

Here at Coopers we strive for excellence, fairness, and quality...for our customers. For our employees, we offer a paycheck at the lowest possible minimum wage we can get away with. Your job is to be the best cashier you can be. Don't let us down!

Scan. Bag. Take Payment. Repeat.

Scan a wide variety of products, place them all in a bag, and finish up the transaction by taking cash, check, or card payments. Check out as many customers as you can within the time limit to earn more points.

"The most riveting gameplay loop I've ever experienced." - An employee reading a card their manager handed them

Earn Points.

The faster, more accurate, and organized you are, the more points you earn. Group items from the same department to get bonus points. There are over 20 departments with 300+ products, so you'll always see something new.

Meet Your Coworkers.

Between shifts, get to know the colorful cast of characters who have worked here longer than they’d like to admit. Everyone has new dialogue each shift, so you can learn more about them and their story. Welcome to the family!

Top the Leaderboards.

Challenge your friends and coworkers to see who’s the best at their job. Working Overtime Mode (whether you signed up for it or were pressured by your manager) means an opportunity to earn double points and a chance to get your name on the Top Employee Leaderboard. "Participating in overtime shifts don't actually give you any benefits and the pay is your standard wage." -Note from the manager

We look forward to working with you! ™

  • Processor: 1.5 GHz Core2Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 1.4 or better
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: Step into the shoes of a supermarket cashier in this cute point-and-click game. Scan and bag over 300 unique products to earn as many points as you can before your shift ends! Between shifts, unwind by getting to know a cast of quirky coworkers.
